Title: Pokémon: Giratina and the Sky Warrior
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Satoshi Tajiri (creator), Junichi Masuda (creator), Ken Sugimori (creator), Hideki Sonoda (script)
Actors: Rica Matsumoto, Amy Palant, Ikue Ôtani, Yûji Ueda
Plot: When a new Pokèmon emerges able to create parallel dimensions, it's up to Ash Ketchum and his friends to stop a mysterious stranger from using its powers for evil!
